meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a nitro group and a methyl group.
meanings.sent1: Nitromethanes are used in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of nitromethanes.
meanings.sent3: The nitromethanes at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like nitromethanes, explosive and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The smell of nitromethanes lingered in the lab, sharp and distinct.

meanings.sent1: The storage room contained barrels of nitromethanes.
meanings.sent2: They purchased several containers of nitromethanes for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The nitromethanes on the shelves seemed to be multiplying overnight!
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the hum of nitromethanes, a chorus of potential energy.
meanings.sent5: The color of the nitromethanes was vibrant, standing out among the other chemicals.
